title: Split-step basics
summary: Split-step is the timing cue that loads your legs for a fast first move.

sections.title: Key points
items: Start the split as the opponent strikes the shuttle.
Land on the balls of the feet with soft knees.
Keep the chest tall and hips low.

sections.title: Steps
items: Small hop as the opponent contacts the shuttle.
Land softly, then push toward the target corner.

sections.title: Common mistakes
items: Jumping too high and losing timing.

drills.name: Clap timing
notes: Keep the hop small and quick.
